channel.title: FLF - The Outstanding Podcast
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Ep. 116: A Christian Perspective on the Attempted Assassination of Donald Trump [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description: Whether you love, hate, or tolerate him - the recent assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump has left many Americans stunned and questioning how this will impact the upcoming election. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by FRC's Senior Fellow Owen Strachan for a discussion on the biblical response to the almost fatal shot. If God wanted to end Donald Trump's life, he would have - but why did he allow another to take the bullet? Joseph and Owen unpack their raw reactions to hearing the news, the difference between coincidence and God ordained, and God's sovereignty ordaining evil for good. As Christians, we are not called to give up on the public square. May we trust our God is faithful and working on our behalf.
item.author: Joseph Backholm
item.itunes:author: Joseph Backholm

item.title: Ep.115: The Truth Behind Chemical Abortion with Elizabeth Gillette [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
Life-threatening, deceitful, and traumatic, the abortion pill is ruining lives. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by pro-life speaker and author, Elizabeth Gillette, as she shares her story of being a victim of chemical abortion. Elizabeth shares how she was manipulated by people and organizations she thought she could trust, the lies Planned Parenthood showed and told her, and how the chemical abortion has and will continue to affect her, both emotionally and physically. Joseph and Elizabeth warn of the dangers of taking the pill, along with the terrifying reality of how easy it is to obtain, no matter age or gender. Listen now to better understand the dangers and impacts of chemical abortions!

*Listener discretion -- this podcast goes into detailed description of a chemical abortion and the physical process that happens when the pill is consumed*
item.author: Joseph Backholm
item.itunes:author: Joseph Backholm
